did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, reprints, notes, student papers, scrapbooks, accounts, certificates, diplomas, and memorabilia.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Professional papers include correspondence, reprints, notes, student papers, a scrapbook concerning a Cornell Smoking Contest in which Professor Monroe was the winner, and other material related to Cornell University. Personal papers include Monroe family material; correspondence; accounts; material on Ithaca High School, Cornell University, Alpha Zeta, Town & Gown Club, and Rotary Club; certificates and diplomas; Cornell broadsides; political broadsides and memorabilia; scrapbooks; and local history material on Romulus, Varick, and Ithaca, New York.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Professional papers include correspondence, reprints, notes, student papers, a scrapbook concerning a Cornell Smoking Contest in which Professor Monroe was the winner, and other material related to Cornell University. Personal papers include Monroe family material; correspondence; accounts; material on Ithaca High School, Cornell University, Alpha Zeta, Town & Gown Club, and Rotary Club; certificates and diplomas; Cornell broadsides; political broadsides and memorabilia; scrapbooks; and local history material on Romulus, Varick, and Ithaca, New York.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Benton Sullivan Monroe papers, #14-12-1356. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
